abstract: Valeant Pharmaceuticals resolves default on some of its $30 billion debt by filing its long-delayed United States financial report for 2015; accounting problems at company linger.
lead_paragraph: The Canadian drug maker is dealing with three federal inquiries into its accounting and business practices, and a huge plunge in its stock price.

headline.main: Valeant Pharmaceuticals Files Overdue U.S. 2015 Financial Report
headline.print_headline: Valeant Files U.S. Report as Accounting Issues Linger

snippet: The Canadian drug maker is dealing with three federal inquiries into its accounting and business practices, and a huge plunge in its stock price.
